languages.text: {n}Прежде, чем удача улыбнулась охотникам, один из добывающих комплексов полностью вымер в результате "случайного" загрязнения водных фильтров химикатами.{/n}
{n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Прежде, чем удача улыбнулась охотникам, один из добывающих комплексов полностью вымер в результате "случайного" загрязнения водных фильтров химикатами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，还没等好运眷顾猎人，其中一片矿区的滤水器就“意外”遭到化学物质的污染，整片矿区被彻底摧毁。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，还没等好运眷顾猎人，其中一片矿区的滤水器就“意外”遭到化学物质的污染，整片矿区被彻底摧毁。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antes de que la fortuna sonriera a los cazadores, uno de los complejos mineros fue aniquilado después de que sus filtros de agua se contaminaran «accidentalmente» con productos químicos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que la fortuna sonriera a los cazadores, uno de los complejos mineros fue aniquilado después de que sus filtros de agua se contaminaran «accidentalmente» con productos químicos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハンターたちに幸運の女神がほほ笑む前に、鉱山の施設のひとつが、そのウォーター・フィルターが化学薬品によって"偶然"汚染され、全滅してしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンターたちに幸運の女神がほほ笑む前に、鉱山の施設のひとつが、そのウォーター・フィルターが化学薬品によって"偶然"汚染され、全滅してしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avant que la chance ne sourie aux chasseurs, l'un des complexes miniers est entièrement perdu suite à une contamination "accidentelle" de son eau potable par des produits chimiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant que la chance ne sourie aux chasseurs, l'un des complexes miniers est entièrement perdu suite à une contamination "accidentelle" de son eau potable par des produits chimiques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ehe das Glück auf die Jäger herablächeln konnte, wurde einer der Bergbaukomplexe ausgelöscht, nachdem seine Wasserfilter durch einen "Unfall" mit Chemikalien verseucht wurden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ehe das Glück auf die Jäger herablächeln konnte, wurde einer der Bergbaukomplexe ausgelöscht, nachdem seine Wasserfilter durch einen "Unfall" mit Chemikalien verseucht wurden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şans henüz avcıların yüzüne gülemeden su filtrelerine "kazara" kimyasal maddeler karışan bir maden tesisi, nüfusunun tamamını yitirdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before fortune could smile on the hunters, one of the mining complexes was wiped out after its water filters had been "accidentally" contaminated by chemicals.{/n}
